attributes.action: Support Nicaragua in maintaining Law 204 for its bravery in defending its Citizens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Nicaragua has maintained law 204, upholding this law against the promotion of lifestyles, maintaining it is protecting its Citizens!
"Amnesty International" is pressurising diplomats to act against Nicaraguan Law to promote alternative lfestyles and Abortion!
Laws are for Counties to decide for the good of its Citizens, not for "outside Organisations" to decide.
